title: Use Computer
details: I use the computer daily, wear various articles on it sometimes, and play games in my spare time.

title: Help At Home
details: I try to spend time with my family, and help them in many ways, especially during the holidays.

title: visited my grand Parents
details: I love my grandpa dida, I like to spend time with them, they tell me their stories, which I like very much, doda loves me very much.

title: walk to school
details: I like to walk to school every day from my house, school is very near from my house, I have some friends with me, we all go to school together.

title: watch tv
details: In my spare time I like to watch TV, I watch different kinds of news on TV, besides it is a good way to spend time.

title: talk to my friend
details: I like to spend time with friends, my friends are very sincere, we have a lot of fun together, my friends sometimes go to many places together.

title: share my things
details: I like to think, and I like to share these thoughts with my friends, and I sometimes jot down my thoughts, I like to think about different things.

title: physical exercise
details: The first thing I do every morning is to exercise, it refreshes my body and mind, I am joined by my friends.

title: listen to music
details: I like to listen to music, I listen to music when I feel bad, I love to listen to music
